name: useless fridge simulator
description:
Prototype useless fridge simulator for useless simulation jam 2019.

v3 exactly the same as v2, but one more, so better.

v2 turns on the compressor when you open the door, sound file from freesound.org, my own fridge is too quiet.

v2 might turn on a light inside the fridge when you open the door... but then again maybe not.

v1 allows you to open the fridge door, and close the fridge door.
